Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to extending the occupancy tax in the village of Tuckahoe
Summary: Extends the occupancy tax in the village of Tuckahoe until September 1, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 505 of the laws of 2016, amending the tax law relating to the imposition of an occupancy tax in the village of Tuckahoe, in relation to extending the effectiveness thereof
